question: Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
question_with_options:
Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
A. rubbish bin
B. baseball
C. None
D. None
triage_reason: The baseball is in the foreground, captured mid-air near the batter, while the rubbish bin is in the background behind the fence, making the depth relationship very obvious.
